name: updateOrganizationApplianceVpnVpnFirewallRules
description: Update the firewall rules of an organization's site-to-site VPN

rules.comment: Allow TCP traffic to subnet with HTTP servers.

rules.description: An ordered array of the firewall rules (not including the default rule)

destCidr.description: Comma-separated list of destination IP address(es) (in IP or CIDR notation) or 'any' (FQDN not supported)

destPort.description: Comma-separated list of destination port(s) (integer in the range 1-65535), or 'any'

policy.description: 'allow' or 'deny' traffic specified by this rule

protocol.description: The type of protocol (must be 'tcp', 'udp', 'icmp', 'icmp6' or 'any')

srcCidr.description: Comma-separated list of source IP address(es) (in IP or CIDR notation), or 'any' (FQDN not supported)

srcPort.description: Comma-separated list of source port(s) (integer in the range 1-65535), or 'any'

syslogEnabled.description: Log this rule to syslog (true or false, boolean value) - only applicable if a syslog has been configured (optional)

syslogDefaultRule.description: Log the special default rule (boolean value - enable only if you've configured a syslog server) (optional)
